short.am,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Protect your privacy on WhatsApp Web with screen lock and blur effects
short.bg: Защитете поверителността си в WhatsApp Web с заключване на екрана и ефекти на замъгляване
short.cs: Chraňte své soukromí na WhatsApp Web pomocí zámku obrazovky a efektů rozmazání
short.da: Beskyt dit privatliv på WhatsApp Web med skærmlås og sløring effekter
short.de: Schützen Sie Ihre Privatsphäre auf WhatsApp Web mit Bildschirmsperre und Unschärfeeffekten
short.el: Προστατέψτε το απόρρητό σας στο WhatsApp Web με κλείδωμα οθόνης και εφέ θόλωσης

short.et: Kaitske oma privaatsust WhatsApp Webis ekraaniluku ja hägustamisefektidega

short.hi: स्क्रीन लॉक और ब्लर इफेक्ट के साथ WhatsApp Web पर अपनी गोपनीयता की रक्षा करें
short.hr: Zaštitite svoju privatnost na WhatsApp Webu pomoću zaključavanja zaslona i efekta zamućenja

short.it: Proteggi la tua privacy su WhatsApp Web con blocco schermo ed effetti sfocatura
short.ja: 画面ロックとぼかし効果でWhatsApp Webのプライバシーを保護
short.ko: 화면 잠금과 흐림 효과로 WhatsApp Web의 개인정보 보호
short.lt: Apsaugokite savo privatumą WhatsApp Web su ekrano užraktu ir suliejimo efektais
short.lv: Aizsargājiet savu privātumu WhatsApp Web ar ekrāna bloķēšanu un izplūšanas efektiem
short.nl: Bescherm je privacy op WhatsApp Web met schermvergrendeling en vervagingseffecten
short.no: Beskytt personvernet ditt på WhatsApp Web med skjermlås og uskarphet-effekter
short.pl: Chroń swoją prywatność w WhatsApp Web za pomocą blokady ekranu i efektów rozmycia
short.ro: Protejați-vă confidențialitatea pe WhatsApp Web cu blocare ecran și efecte de estompare
short.ru: Защитите свою конфиденциальность в WhatsApp Web с помощью блокировки экрана и эффектов размытия

short.sl: Zaščitite svojo zasebnost na WhatsApp Web z zaklepanjem zaslona in učinki zameglitve

short.th: ปกป้องความเป็นส่วนตัวของคุณบน WhatsApp Web ด้วยการล็อกหน้าจอและเอฟเฟกต์การเบลอ

short.zh_CN: 通过屏幕锁定和模糊效果保护您在 WhatsApp Web 上的隐私

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SecureChat for WhatsApp Web Premium – 🔒 Privacy Protection That’s 100% Free! 🎉

Protect your chats on WhatsApp Web with SecureChat for WhatsApp Web Premium – the ultimate privacy extension that’s FREE FOREVER! 💯

Whether you’re in a busy office, shared workspace, or a crowded public place, SecureChat ensures your conversations stay private and protected from prying eyes.

🌟 Key Features
✅ Screen Lock:
Secure WhatsApp Web with a password-protected lock screen. Step away confidently, knowing your private chats remain hidden. Perfect for offices, shared computers, or public areas.

✅ Message Hiding:
Blur sensitive content and reveal it only when needed:

* User/Group Names
* Profile Pictures
* Last Message Previews
* All Messages in Chat
* Media Previews
* Text Input
Stay discreet and in control, even in crowded spaces!

✨ Why Choose SecureChat?
💡 For Professionals: Work with confidence in offices or co-working spaces.
🏢 For Public Places: Safeguard your chats in cafes, libraries, or other shared environments.
🎁 Free Forever: Enjoy premium privacy features at no cost – no subscriptions or hidden fees!

🔐 Download SecureChat for WhatsApp Web Premium now to take control of your privacy. It’s free, easy to use, and perfect for anyone who values security! 🚀
